title: Lucky Love
description: For perpetually single Jazmyn Harding, what's worse than being desperate and dateless?Receiving advice from her brash, sixty-year-old aunt via Skype from Love, a kooky town in California.Jazmyn has no intention to visit Love, but after one too many disastrous dates she agrees to Aunt Flo's challenge: if she's single in a month, she'll swap Sydney for Love.Determined to find Mr. Right, Jazmyn plays the dating game with renewed vigour. But as the clock ticks down and her man drought continues, how far will she go to avoid Love?
author: Nicola Marsh
